name: Indifferent Solo Hat [1]
description: Yellow box with two holes. Put the box on the head to sense the essence of self entertainment.

name: Indifferent Solo Hat [1] Blueprint
description: Yellow box with two holes. Put the box on the head to sense the essence of self entertainment.

name: Infiltrator [1]
description: The Katars specially used on humans. Senior Assassins use it to carry out assassination. Very terrible.

name: Infiltrator [2]
description: The Katars specially used on humans. Senior Assassins use it to carry out assassination. Very terrible.

name: Infinity Axe [1]
description: This weapon has a strange Str, as if some of it had been sealed.

name: Infinity Axe [2]
description: This weapon has a strange Str, as if some of it had been sealed.

name: Infinity Bow [2]
description: This weapon has a strange Str, as if some of it had been sealed.

name: Infinity Bow [3]
description: This weapon has a strange Str, as if some of it had been sealed.

name: INT Earring
description: The magic earrings that contain mysterious power, wearing it makes people full of energy.

name: INT Earring [1]
description: The magic earrings that contain mysterious power, wearing it makes people full of energy.

name: Int Meal A
description: With just one bite, You can feel a strong impact like dragon's breath. It's said that anyone who has tasted this wine would never forget the flavor. INT ＋5, Magic Damage ＋10%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: Int Meal B
description: With just one bite, You can feel a strong impact like dragon's breath. It's said that anyone who has tasted this wine would never forget the flavor. INT ＋10, Magic Damage ＋20%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: Intimacy Growth Pack
description: A well-planned gift bag. Open it to receive items for intimacy cultivation.

name: Invincible Ice
description: Ice drink sprinkled with invincible grains, the soft taste is much impressive. Eating it decreases all magic damage you suffer to 1 point, the effect lasts 8 seconds. All ice drinks share 1-min CD, and can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Invisible Syrup
description: Syrup that allows player to be invisible. Once drinking it, you will immediately enter a hiding state, In which your moving speed will be reduced. Such effects last 30 seconds, and this item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Invitation from Stars
description: You get another chance since you are blessed by the starry sky! (Special benefit: Every adventurer has a chance to change the result everyday, Though you need to buy [Invitation from Stars] , a special item in the Zodiac Shop first. As long as the adventurer who starts the divination has the special item, the adventurer who is invited but without the item can also obtain an item of the guidance of constellation. But in this way, Every adventurer only has one chance to change the result.)

name: Ionized Jur
description: Special jur with ionized blade which compensates an assassin's lack of strength. Rapid strikes from this weapon are devastating.
